response.original_title: Am I the Ageless Object in the Museum?
response.overview: Based on a narrative that is written in parallel with several visits to different zoos and zoologies in Palestine, Switzerland and Egypt. The film is under a larger umbrella that contains different works that range between video, video installation, novel and performance, in which each of these episodes deal with the concept of the museum from a different perspective. The projected video deals with the construction of the zoo and its historical relation to the museum, and the relation between museums and cemeteries. Where the three of these components are related to the discipline of history and uses a similar aesthetics in the display of the history representation.
response.title: Am I the Ageless Object in the Museum?
